text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
It's the academy's annual summer<n>training camp, and Air
Groove has<n>been spending the bulk of her training<n>time
running on the beach.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: Phew. Twenty kilometers already?

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
I don't tire out on the sand as easily<n>as I used to. When it
comes to<n>improving stamina and core strength,<n>there's
truly no better place than the<n>beach.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
Not to mention its utility as an<n>analogue to dirt courses. I'm
in better<n>form than ever—right now, I don't<n>think I could
lose to anyone. ...Hm?

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: Dear me. Is it already time for the<n>festival to begin?

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Come to think of it, she did mention<n>she would be patrolling
the festival on<n>behalf of the student council tonight.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
Students tend to get much too excited<n>at the festival every
year. Someone<n>has to keep an eye on them for their<n>own
safety; I should go.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: Very well... as long as you understandthat we're going for work and notto fool around.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: If you can promise me that, then sure,<n>come along.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
Cotton candy, takoyaki, candied<n>carrots... All these sweets
can't<n>possibly be doing anything positive<n>for the
students' training.
choice_data_list: Let me get you a little something!

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
I seem to recall telling you that we<n>aren't here to fool
around. Did the<n>summer sun fry your brain or<n>something?

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: Really, what am I supposed to do with<n>you... Hm?

text_block_list.name: Umamusume A
text_block_list.text: Eek! S-stop that, please!

text_block_list.name: Journalist
text_block_list.text:
I just need a few shots! You're all<n>Tracen students, right?
You're<n>practically guaranteed to be future<n>stars!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
A man who appears to be a tabloid<n>writer is is taking photos
of students<n>against their will.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: How impudent...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Air Groove looks like she's about to<n>blow a gasket. I step
forward to do<n>something about it.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: Sigh... No, I'll go.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: Please keep watch from here.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Air Groove approaches the scene at a<n>determined pace.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: Excuse me. Did you mention that you<n>were a journalist?

text_block_list.name: Journalist
text_block_list.text: Huh? W-wait... You're the Empress...<n>Air Groove!

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
I'm not sure which publication you<n>represent, but our school
requires all<n>reporters to obtain permission before<n>talking to
students.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
This measure is in place for the<n>protection of students'
privacy. I trust<n>you understand that?

text_block_list.name: Journalist
text_block_list.text:
Oh, um... I'm sorry. I'm an<n>Umamusume-centric reporter,
you<n>see...

text_block_list.name: Journalist
text_block_list.text:
Racing has been a passion of mine<n>since I was young, and I
guess I kind<n>of lose control when I see the runners<n>I
admire up close...

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: Please do know that we are honored<n>to encounter our fans.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
But we would all appreciate if you<n>could adhere to proper
etiquette.<n>Schedule something official, and you<n>won't
encounter any problems.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
The reporter is easily swayed by Air<n>Groove's polite
admonishing and<n>quickly leaves the scene.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I recall Air Groove's falling-out with<n>her previous trainer.
Would the Air<n>Groove from back then have handled<n>this
situation so calmly?

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
All right, that marks the end of my<n>shift, and everything's in
order.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: I suppose we could return to the<n>lodge now, but...

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: Ah... Are those fireworks?

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: In that case, come with me. I know a<n>good spot.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
The shrine commands a panoramic<n>night view of the city.
Away from the<n>hustle and bustle of the festival, only<n>the
sound of fireworks can be heard.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
Just like flowers, fireworks are the<n>product of much hard
work and<n>attention. No wonder they're a sight<n>to see in
full bloom.
choice_data_list:
I bet there'll be fireworks blooming for you one
day.

I bet there'll be fireworks blooming for you one
day.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
Planting a garden in the sky... It<n>wouldn't be a simple task,
but<n>someday...

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: Wow... They really are beautiful.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: The reflections from the blooms<n>dazzle in her eyes.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: Heh, what are you looking at?

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
Hey, what's with the sappy<n>expression? Have you no
shame?

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: The show's finished. Let's head<n>back for real this time.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: She begins to hasten off, but...

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: Oof.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
The uneven stone surface causes Air<n>Groove to tumble
onto the ground.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: Hmph. It'll take more than a silly<n>stumble to...

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: Actually... Strike that.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: Will you help me with this shoe?

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: I pick up her stray high heel and kneel<n>before her.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: Hey...

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: While you're doing that... answer me<n>one question.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: In your eyes... How do you perceive<n>me?

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: I see. Then I've been cultivating my<n>own bloom effectively.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
I'm still not fully convinced of... what<n>was that? The
greenness of your<n>thumb? ...Well, maybe you'll get there<n>
eventually.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
Continue to work hard, and perhaps<n>you really can produce
a wonderful<n>crown of flowers for me, just as I will<n>lead
you to glory.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: But first, could you please put on my<n>shoe?

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Air Groove emanates an even more<n>beautiful air of regality
than when we<n>first crossed paths.
